articles.title: 17 Modifiable Lifestyle Factors That Protect Your Brain From Aging and Dementia - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The results of a comprehensive systematic review reinforce the evidence supporting tools like the Brain Care Score in reducing the risk of age-related brain diseases. Age-related brain diseases, including stroke, dementia, and late-life depression, can signif…
articles.content:
Researchers identified 17 modifiable risk factors shared by stroke, dementia, and late-life depression, offering a pathway to reduce multiple brain disease risks through behavioral changes.
